title: ‘Show us the money’! Megyn Kelly returns to Fox News and tells Tucker Carlson what NBC must do if they have nothing to hide about Matt Lauer [video]
text:
Twitchy reported earlier this month that in Ronan Farrow’s new book, “To Catch and Kill,” former NBC producer Brooke Nevils alleged that she was raped in 2014 by Matt Lauer while in Sochi for the Olympics. Nevils claims that NBC brass knew about it and chose to do nothing.

In a tweet, the Washington Examiner’s Tiana Lowe invoked Megyn Kelly while putting it all into perspective:

If NBC was willing to fire @RonanFarrow for *potentially* exposing Lauer's misconduct, then it follows that they'd fire @megynkelly for covering that story on national television. More & more, it looks like NBC fired Kelly for masterfully doing her job.https://t.co/lQc2dPrpWK — Tiana Lowe (@TianaTheFirst) October 9, 2019

Wednesday evening, former Fox News host Megyn Kelly returned to that network after leaving NBC to say it’s time for NBC to be totally transparent about what happened:

"Show us the money."@MegynKelly says NBC needs to release all Matt Lauer accusers from their confidentiality agreements if the network truly has nothing to hide. pic.twitter.com/qBTTywmKyL — Washington Examiner (@dcexaminer) October 17, 2019

Here’s Kelly’s interview with Tucker Carlson on Fox News in three parts:







Where’s this all going? Stay tuned.
description: "The number one thing that needs to happen now is..."
